articles.title: Ashleigh Barty wins ladies golf tournament in Queensland and walks away with £17 in prize money - Tennis365
articles.description: Barely a fortnight after retiring from tennis, Ashleigh Barty returned to winning ways - albeit away from the tennis court - as the former world No 1 won the Brookwater Golf and Country Club ladies event on Saturday.
